fields.name: Skill Description
fields.value:
• A Peltasts unit activates the <Fighting Spirit> skill with every attack.
• The skill increases the unit's own attack power.
• The unit can increase its own attack up to 5 times.
• If the unit's attack is interrupted, its attack is reset.
• A level-9 Peltasts unit has a maximum attack of 900 (12950 x 1.036 x 1.036 x 1.036 x 1.036 x 1.036)
• The unit's basic attack has AoE (penetrating) effect.
• Attack increase: 2% / 2.2% / 2.4% / 2.6% / 2.8% / 3% / 3.2% / 3.4% / 3.6%

fields.name: Main Uses
fields.value: • Peltasts are one of the most used troops in both Arena and Honor Hunting.
